      • cloneMessage

        protected DiscreteEnergyMessage cloneMessage(int edge)
        Description copied from class: SNode
        Returns a clone of outgoing message for given edge.

        Overrides:
        cloneMessage in class SNode
        Parameters:
        edge - index in the range [0, SNode.getSiblingCount()-1].
        Returns:
        clone of message if applicable. May return null if there is no message or if subclass does not support messages. In the latter case, SNode.supportsMessageEvents() should return false.

        The default implementation returns null.

        Subclasses that override this method to return a non-null message should also override SNode.supportsMessageEvents().

      • supportsMessageEvents

        protected boolean supportsMessageEvents()
        Description copied from class: SNode
        Indicate subclass has a concept of passing a IParameterizedMessage messages.

        Should only return true if:

        • SNode.cloneMessage(int) can return non-null message
        • SNode.messageEventType() is non-null
        • SNode.createMessageEvent(int, com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.core.parameterizedMessages.IParameterizedMessage, com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.core.parameterizedMessages.IParameterizedMessage) can return a non-null event
        Since SVariableBase and SFactorBase implement the latter two methods, subclasses of those classes that support message events only need to implement SNode.cloneMessage(int) and this method.

        The default implementation returns false.

        Overrides:
        supportsMessageEvents in class SNode

      • getEffectiveUpdateApproach

        public UpdateApproach getEffectiveUpdateApproach()
        Returns the effective update approach for the factor. If the update approach is set to automatic, this value is not valid until the graph is initialized. Note that a factor with only one edge always employs the normal update approach.
        Since:
        0.07
